prompt: A driving electronic club track with a pounding four-on-the-floor kick and sharp claps on the backbeat. Steady mechanical hi-hats lock in the groove while a wide atmospheric synth pad fills the stereo field. A simple catchy synth hook repeats over the top. Energetic and relentless. Instrumental, no vocals.
